name: Story of a Cube
description: Story of a Cube is an action packed shooter about a lone cube and his quest for revenge. Mixing elements of twin-stick shooters and bullet hell games, this is a hardcode arcade game with a crazy amount of explosions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 32 or 64 bit Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 compatible sound card or better Additional Notes: Should run on most potatoes.

reviews.review_text: If you want a shooter thats going to push you to play the game better and better! Then I can't reccomend this highly enough, but beware anyone easily frustrated because behind the simple premise of story of a cube lies a deeply challenging game.  Pros  -Challenging gameplay -Great soundtrack -Good Level design -Feeling of accomplishmernt after completing a difficult part  Cons  -Having to re-play the same part of the game over and over again.
